Text:
@ sinner77

Ritwik Ghatak er baki 5 ta film + Suchitra Sen er classic gulo jato taratari debo ! (except new releases ! + 1-2 adult chara, public demand, he he he ! ) because i'm in a great hurry ! karon ache ! pare balbo !

sinner77,koustoov,saurabhrock chara baki karur kathar jabab debo na thik karechi !

sinner77, ekhane movie up karte giye bujlam kano bangali ra eto pichiye gache ! samosto jaygay ! internation level to anek durer bapyar sarbo bharotio khetrye o amar pratidin pichiye jabo ! aro pichiye parbo ! karon amader kankra sulov monobritti ! jato din amader eai mentality problem ta thak be tato din unnotir kono abokash nei ! eta sattyi je tumi ar koustoov na thakle ami ar up kortam na !

Are baba kader janyo up karte jawa ? eto kosto kare rip + watermark + kata --- anek samay lage bhai ! tarpar matro 4-5 ghanta ghumiye  alarm diye kono mate ghum theke uthe eto pressure niye tomader kato gulo bhalo movie upohar debar chesta karchi seta amar dosh ? kato apobad na sunlam !

Jai hok ami chesta karbo roj raat 2 tor theke ghum bhenge uthe parte ! khub kasto habe tabu chesta karbo ! tomar je samsto movie request ache sab list kare amar last 2 to post e likhe dao ! jato taratari segulo tomake up kare debo ! abar balchi i'm in a hurry ! tai tomar requested film gulo taratari diye jete chai ! 

Ebong Subho Mahalaya bandhu ! bhalo theko !

Robinda jani sobai leech kore keu seed kore na sudhu tumi noi oneke public trackere beng boi upload kora chere dieche,sudhu tumi tike acho ... Kintu janbe kolkatai give and take policy nei jekhane elictricity bill hajar takar upore interneter bill 30 kbps 700 takar upore...amra gorib tai download korte somoy chole jai seed hoe na,

amake reply dite hobe na ami rag korini sudhu aje bajeder songe jhogda koro na ar 
bhalobhasar anek naam boi ta upload koro pls.,  tomake chara kake request korbo goto 4 week dhore request korchi.
Pujoy bhalo theko,

sharodiyar shubecha.

Hello Robinda, May be i'm new here but atodin dhore tomar upload gulor apekhaye thekechi. Because i love to see bengali art film and the old movies rather than new commercial ones. I do seed when it is possible for me. hayto sab gulor seed korteo parini because computer format korte hoeche. Ami er age anekbar pirate bay te account korte chesta korechi but last tym successfulu seta hoeche. Er ager account ta access korte parina. Well whatever but keep uploading. I'm really a big fan of urs because of your uploaded movies. Ami akhono leech ki janina because as i said i'm new. 
Reply is not necessary jst ei message ta gelei habe tomar kache. 
Suvo Sarodiya in advance and Suvo debipokho

thks Robin u r the best.

Yes i am ur biggest supporter,but there is my Boudi who is ur biggest fan.
She is the one making all the requests for classics.Just thought u wld like to know
I also agree with  u abt the seeding bit.I  think the time has cum for u to upgrade ur connection as waking up in the night is too taxing and may result in health problems later on.

So my request to u is to go in for a upgraded unlimited connection.
Wish u a belated Happy Mahalaya bondhu

p.s: Unfortunately im leaving for mumbai during pujas for my shows .Will be back only on 8th.Plz keep uploading as usual for all ur countless other fans n supporters.......Bhalo theko
take care
regds
hi Robin......I'm one of the admirers of ur bengali uploads and have a request aswell ........can u plz upload "Kranti starring Jeet" in HD version .....thanks in advance............
